meanings.definition: Having made a firm decision and being resolved not to change it.
meanings.sent1: She was determined to finish her homework before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The determined student studied hard for the test.
meanings.sent3: The determined squirrel refused to give up on cracking the nut.
meanings.sent4: The determined athlete pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent5: Her determined gaze showed her unwavering focus on the task at hand.

meanings.definition: Showing a strong desire to succeed and not giving up easily.
meanings.sent1: He had a determined look in his eyes as he approached the challenge.
meanings.sent2: The determined team never lost hope during the match.
meanings.sent3: The determined chef was set on creating the perfect dish, no matter what.
meanings.sent4: The determined explorer braved the harsh conditions to reach the summit.
meanings.sent5: Their determined efforts paid off when they achieved their goal.
